item.title: What is Super Smash Bros. Ultimate ?
item.description: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate (SSBU), or just Smash for short, is a fighting game, released in 2018, developed by Sora Ltd, and Bandai Namco and published by Nintendo. Itâ€™s the fifth game of the Super Smash Bros Series. The games feature a lot of characters (up to 80 with DLC) from Nintendo Mascots, like Mario or Link, to third party franchises, like Minecraft or Final Fantasy. Official nintendo banner for the game Nintendo.
